group_1.textCenter: I wish Witches would behave themselves@for New Year's...

group_1.textLeft: U-ugh..

group_1.textRight: [chara:200701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textLeft: Y-you're...!

group_1.textRight: I'm not doing anything.@Not a Magical Girl at all!
You were wibble-wobbling like you were dying,
so I was...@Just a little worried for you is all, mister!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I was struggling...went to the rooftop...
I see, so that means you came and helped me.
...Now how could I repay you...
And so, as thanks, I got haregi from him.
He said the kimono's imagery matches@Nagisa perfectly,
but I'd have been happier getting cheesecake...

group_1.textRight: That is no comparison to such elegant haregi.
That aside, to receive a kimono from a designer@you don't know,
and one so expensive from a complete stranger@at that...

group_1.textLeft: It can't be helped 'cause I already got it!
Mami, we're already here, so I wanna wear it!

group_1.textRight: I don't particularly mind, but is it really okay@to accept...

group_1.textCenter: Phew, and with that it's complete!
Ugh, it's kind of tight. There's no way@I can get used to being this cramped...

group_1.textRight: *Chuckle*
It isn't often that you get a chance to wear@a kimono, so it's like a fresh experience, is it not?

group_1.textLeft: It's not that special. It takes forever to put on@and it's painful.
I'm kind of regretting this...

group_1.textRight: But it matches you so well.@You look incredibly cute.
Ah, since we've gone through the trouble,@why don't the two of us go visit the shrine?
We can buy a cheesecake on the way home.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:200751:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]That's a wonderful idea!@Putting this kimono on was so worth it.
Mami~...@It's too hard to walk in these clothes...

group_1.textRight: *Chuckle* I know it's hard to get used to at first,@so let's take it leisurely to the shrine.
Goodness me.@What an adorable haregi...

group_1.textLeft: ...Heh?@You talking about mine?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, it's so vibrant and very lovely.

group_1.textLeft: For some reason it feels like all the pain@from walking just disappeared.
Mami! We're drawing our omikuji right away!

group_1.textRight: Sure, we'll pay our respects at the shrine first.
Um, excuse me...!@Could I take your picture?
No reason to be suspicious!@We're from the photography club...
Yes, your kimono is just so awesome!

group_1.textLeft: Eh, mine...you mean?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, there's no one who could wear@that kimono better than you!

group_1.textLeft: For some reason I feel like the main character@today...
Hehe, guess it can't be helped.@Take all the pictures you want!

group_1.textRight: Alright, let's get you over there too, miss!
You two got a really great balance going!

group_1.textLeft: Oh dear, I'm included...?@This is a little embarrassing.
Home at last...@New Year's is full of people...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, it is a bit tiring, isn't it?
It is cramped in these kimono, so shall we@change out of them for today?

group_1.textLeft: Change...

group_1.textCenter: But it matches you so well.@You look incredibly cute.
Yes, your kimono is just so awesome!

group_1.textLeft: ...At first, I wondered why go through@all this trouble,
but after walking around in it the whole day,
this isn't that bad either, is it...
...It feels like a shame to take it off...

group_1.textRight: *Chuckle* For you to say that and do your best@to wear it—
I'm sure the person who gave you it@would be happy to know it was worth it.

group_1.textLeft: Mami...could I stay in this just a little longer?

group_1.textRight: I don't mind, but...
You can't eat the cheesecake we bought to your@heart's content in that outfit, now can you?

group_1.textLeft: This is a dilemma...!

group_1.textRight: You don't have to worry about it.@I can dress you again.

group_1.textLeft: You really mean it?!
In that case, it's time to get this off@and have some cake!
...This year is starting to feel like@it's going to be great!
